argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( dist ` R ) |` ( ( Base ` R ) X. ( Base ` R ) ) ) = ( ( dist ` R ) |` ( ( Base ` R ) X. ( Base ` R ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ZMod ` R ) = ( ZMod ` R ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_isrrext | |- ( R e. RRExt <-> ( ( R e. NrmRing /\ R e. DivRing ) /\ ( ( ZMod ` R ) e. NrmMod /\ ( chr ` R ) = 0 ) /\ ( R e. CUnifSp /\ ( UnifSt ` R ) = ( metUnif ` ( ( dist ` R ) |` ( ( Base ` R ) X. ( Base ` R ) ) ) ) ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simp1bi | |- ( R e. RRExt -> ( R e. NrmRing /\ R e. DivRing ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_simprd | |- ( R e. RRExt -> R e. DivRing ) |
